item.title: Retrieve university entrance exam score
item.description: Why University entrance exam is one of the most important exam of every Vietnamese student. In the year of 2020, by analyzing exam score, people discover abnormal data point and then detect a serious cheating. The full data is normally not public by the Education Department. However, anyone could get the exam result through multiple website by fill in correct candidate ID. This post present how to use R to send API request to retrieve full exam score in the whole country in 2021.
